name: M.INK Productions
tag_list: sme, video, news, media, marketing, promotion
overview:
M.INK ProductionsÂ® LLC is a production company with a mission of conceptualizing, writing and producing high quality (HD) video content for the Internet and Television. This includes a wide range of programming such as: news, entertainment, reality, dramas, etc.

In addition, the company assists entrepreneurs and companies in the promotion of their products to customers and potential investors using exciting and visually captivating video, including commercials and b-roll. Voiceover and talent services are also provided. Based in New York City, the company is owned by Marcella Palmer â€“ CEO and Shea Maultsby â€“ COO and CFO. www.minkproductions.tv includes additional information, as well as samples of products and projects of M.INK Productions.

IFV News is a product of M.INK Productions. The web-weekly, which launched March 14, 2009, is a business and financial news program that focuses on midcap, smallcap and microcap companies around the globe, as well as other medium and small businesses. The show can be viewed at www.ifvnews.com, which also contains business and financial news from around the world. IFV News airs every Saturday and may be viewed on-demand. The show remains on the front page of www.ifvnews.com for one week, then is archived on the IFV-Video page. vbg
